tr.title: Barcelona
tr.introduction: Barcelona, Gaudí'nin mimari şaheserleri, canlı gece hayatı ve Akdeniz sahilleriyle büyüler. La Rambla'da yürüyüş, Gothic Quarter'da kaybolmak ve Barceloneta plajında güneşlenmek şehrin vazgeçilmezleridir.
tr.transportation: El Prat'tan Aerobus ile 35 dk Plaça Catalunya'ya (€7.75). Metro 12 hat, T-Casual kartı 10 yolculuk €11.35. Bisiklet paylaşım sistemi Bicing çok yaygın.
tr.accommodation: Gothic Quarter tarihi doku. Eixample Gaudí eserleri için merkezi. Barceloneta plaj hayatı. El Born trendy kafeler. Orta segment 90-160€/gece.
tr.museums: Picasso Müzesi, MACBA (Modern Sanat), Fundació Joan Miró, CosmoCaixa (Bilim), MNAC (Katalan Sanatı).
tr.historicalPlaces: Sagrada Família (bilet €26, aylar öncesinden alın), Park Güell (€10), Casa Batlló (€35), La Pedrera (€25), La Boqueria Pazarı, Gotik Mahalle.
tr.restaurants: La Boqueria'da taze deniz ürünleri. El Born'da tapas barları. Barceloneta'da paella. Patatas bravas, jamón ibérico, churros con chocolate, pa amb tomàquet denenmeli.
tr.citizenship: İspanya vatandaşlığı: 10 yıl yasal ikamet (Latin Amerika ülkeleri 2 yıl). DELE A2 İspanyolca sınavı + CCSE kültür sınavı gerekli. Schengen vizesi 90 gün. Golden Visa: €500,000 gayrimenkul yatırımı ile oturma izni.

en.title: Barcelona
en.summary: Gaudí's city, the pearl of the Mediterranean
en.introduction: Barcelona enchants with Gaudí's architectural masterpieces, vibrant nightlife, and Mediterranean beaches. Walking on La Rambla, getting lost in the Gothic Quarter, and sunbathing on Barceloneta beach are the city's essentials.
en.transportation: From El Prat: Aerobus 35 min to Plaça Catalunya (€7.75). Metro has 12 lines, T-Casual card 10 trips €11.35. Bicing bike-sharing system is very common.
en.accommodation: Gothic Quarter for historic texture. Eixample central for Gaudí works. Barceloneta for beach life. El Born for trendy cafés. Mid-range €90-160/night.
en.museums: Picasso Museum, MACBA (Modern Art), Fundació Joan Miró, CosmoCaixa (Science), MNAC (Catalan Art).
en.historicalPlaces: Sagrada Família (ticket €26, buy months ahead), Park Güell (€10), Casa Batlló (€35), La Pedrera (€25), La Boqueria Market, Gothic Quarter.
en.restaurants: Fresh seafood at La Boqueria. Tapas bars in El Born. Paella in Barceloneta. Patatas bravas, jamón ibérico, churros con chocolate, pa amb tomàquet are must-try.
en.citizenship: Spanish citizenship: 10 years legal residence (Latin American countries 2 years). DELE A2 Spanish exam + CCSE culture exam required. Schengen visa 90 days. Golden Visa: €500,000 real estate investment for residence permit.

routePoints.name: Sagrada Família
routePoints.tips: Buy tickets 2-3 months ahead, tower tour extra €10

routePoints.name: Park Güell
routePoints.tips: Go at 8am, there's a quota and it fills up
